Articles.Content:
There's no parts (atleast that i know of) where the Tiny and Very Tiny nosecones fit.

So why not give them a purpose and add some?

 

Maybe a "Tiny" engine could be a sort of engine like the Spark but maybe taller, and same with the Very Tiny engine.
Seems a lot of work for 2 nosecones, they’d be better getting rid of those instead!

<snip>

Edited June 20, 2021 by Guest

They go on the front of the Breaking Ground motors. Have you tried sticking them on the top of an Ant engine which you attached via surface attachment?

There are mods that add extra small parts- Knes and Luciole both add 0.3125m parts and I'm sure there are others I haven't come across.
